summary: This bill, the Russia-North Korea Cooperation Sanctions Act, aims to impose sanctions on individuals and entities involved in North Korea's support for Russia's war in Ukraine. It mandates the President to sanction foreign persons/financial institutions facilitating the transfer of arms or material support from North Korea to Russia. Sanctions include property blocking and visa restrictions. The bill also amends the North Korea Sanctions and Policy Enhancement Act of 2016, and requires the President to submit regular reports to Congress on North Korea's activities supporting Russia and related US strategies.
